text: Hey everyone, I need a little help with our SEO at <https://www.whichledlight.com>. We are currently using <http://prerender.io|prerender.io> to serve static pages to Google and other bots that have limited JS support. However this is becoming very slow as our site grows with a full site snapshot recache taking 8+ hours. This is not ideal when we are trying to improve our SEO and want to test things quickly. We have been looking at using ember fastboot (we know it is not production ready). Does anybody know if it is stable enough to work with ember-cli?

attachments.title: Which LED Light | LED Bulb & Lamp Comparisons
attachments.text: Which LED Light help you compare and buy LED bulbs online. If your looking for an LED bulb visit <http://whichledlight.com|whichledlight.com> to make a comparison
attachments.fallback: Which LED Light: Which LED Light | LED Bulb & Lamp Comparisons

text: is ember-data 1.13.0 actually meant for public consumption yet? It seems to break everything
there are a bunch of deprecations: <http://emberjs.com/deprecations/v1.x/#toc_deprecations-added-in-1-13> had a look to those yet?
`store.pushPayload` wasn't deprecated but it seems it triggers DS.RESTSerializer to make a deprecated API call
per record, so lots of deprecation warnings that I can't really fix. Pretty annoying
